an1.268-277:4.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya.
an1.268-277:4.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya.
an1.268-277:6.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagaccheyya.
an1.268-277:6.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagaccheyya.
an1.268-277:8.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya.
an1.268-277:8.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya.
an1.268-277:10.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya.
an1.268-277:10.3: Ṭhānañca kho, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya.
an1.268-277:12.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya.
an1.268-277:12.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya.
an1.268-277:14.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya.
an1.268-277:14.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya.
an1.268-277:16.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tathāgatassa paduṭṭhacitto lohitaṃ uppādeyya.
an1.268-277:16.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano tathāgatassa paduṭṭhacitto lohitaṃ uppādeyya.
an1.268-277:18.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyya.
an1.268-277:18.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano saṅghaṃ bhindeyya.
an1.268-277:20.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya.
an1.268-277:20.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puthujjano aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya.
an1.268-277:22.1: * “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ.
an1.268-277:22.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā ekova arahaṃ sammāsambuddho uppajjeyya.
